priorKnowledge.title: My Spanish knowledge before class
priorKnowledge.content: Before starting this class, I had basic familiarity with Spanish pronunciation and a few commonly used phrases. I understood some grammar rules but struggled to apply them in conversation. I had taken Spanish previously but lacked confidence in speaking and listening.

goals.description: Mantener una conversación básica de 5 minutos
Alcanzar el nivel B2 según el Marco Común Europeo
Visitar un país de habla hispana
Usar español en un entorno laboral
